评论详情: In inexpensive wide toe, minimal shoe that works great. These shoes are comfortable and last a long time I wear them to the gym and I have a pair for work. I have had several pairs and love them. These are the same size as I would normally wear.
LOVE THEM

It seems there’s different sellers maybe even manufacturers for the brand. My first  pair was much wider more toe box room. Second pair ( black high tops) were much tighter in the toe area as well as the stitching being crooked and the back of the shoe leaning to the inner side. Sadly having to return
Llegaron rápido a Chile, me gustan mucho, es el segundo par que compro

评论概述: Smaller than non high top whitins
评论详情: I have a pair of the regular whitins so I ordered the same size in the high tops but the high tops were too small so it might be wise to size up! Edit: Ordered a size up and they were WAY too big.
Daughter loves them! As described, fast delivery and decent value.

I have two pair at this point and I’m obsessed! They are SO comfortable- I hate nothing more than my toes being jammed into a too-small shoe. They are great quality- I’ve washed a pair several times and haven’t seen any wear on them yet. I work a lot in a school and these shoes are slip resistant- they help out majorly in the kitchen! I have told everyone I know about these shoes! I will be buying more in different colors as I’ve donated the majority of my other shoes at this point!
Very comfy. Can wear these shoes all day.
Perfect basketball shoes

Edit: I added another star. I decided to open them and try them on and surprisingly they fit! I like the look and feel of them. They are definitely cheaply made but I find this brand a good option for those not wanting to spend so much on other barefoot brands.  I have a different pair of Whitin shoes size 9 that came as European 40 and fit great. I ordered these hight tops in size 9 like last time, but size 41 came, which are too big for me. I'm going to exchange for a size 8 when they are back in stock and will update my review.

I like them. They look really nice and I have received compliments. But it feels like maybe the inside sole doesn’t reach all the way to the end of the shoes. My toes feel kind of like they’re hanging off a tiny little cliff and it does make them ache after a while

Cute design, but the material digs in across the toe knuckle bones where you would really want it to be comfortable. If you open the shoestring all the way to widen it at the bottom there, the shoestring then isn't long enough to go through the top hole, and it still doesn't loosen enough, digging in across the toe knuckle area. There is plenty of room in the toe box to move your toes around if you can get past the pain the tightness on your bones causes. Also, the color is fine, but the material is noticeably cheap to the feel especially. I would have happily paid more for the same shoe made with a higher quality material and enough space across my toe knuckles! Oh well...

I love the high top shoes. Affordable bare feet shoes! Although when they arrived they felt cheap, like they’re going to fall apart, but so far they’ve been really comfortable(except the first day when breaking them in). The material is different, kind of rough, that if they got dirty it’d be hard to clean. Originally bought a white and black pair of the ankle bare shoes for training over a year ago and I wear them almost every day for the gym and work and school. Really comfortable and my feet don’t get tired in them. Also since switching over to bare shoes I don’t get back pain or knee pain.

I have wide feet with bunions and these shoes do not run against my bunion.  My toes have enough room to spread out, and yet the shoe does not make my feet look too wide or "clowny."  Like many high-top sneakers, they take a while to put on, but once they are on, they look like every other high-top sneaker (with none of the narrow show problems).

But my feet never felt comfortable in them. The  quality, appearance and bigger toe box seemed nice but I felt like I was walking over pebbles. Tried to force myself to get used to them but ended up returning.
I have spent thousands of dollars on shoes only to find out they are not wide enough. Love Love Love these! I did replace the insole with my own for more arch support. ❤️

评论概述: I really like the look of these!!…
评论详情: I have the Whitin Chelsea boots and was super excited to try their new hightops. I got these and the other (Converse) style. Time will tell, but I like everything accept the back section around the ankle that definitely rubbed some until I loosened the laces way up, and it’s still a bit of pressure in the back of my achilles heel… we’ll see if that continues to be an issue or not. Otherwise I sized up from a 7 (what I got the Chelsea in) to an 8 and that was the right choice for me wanting a looser barefoot feel in this style, I think a 7 would have been too short. Great 90’s vibes in a low cost barefoot shoe!!

I need wide toebox shoes for bunions. I am loving these high top shoes. I already own several Whitin shoes. These are a nice addition to my collection. I was all my Whitin shoes and they all hold their color (white, black) well and do not fray over time.
I am usually an 8 in women and ordered just that (size 39). They are about a half size too small.

So far I really like these, they seem pretty well made with quality materials. They are definitely wide enough and feel comfortable after walking all day at work. They are pretty warm which will be great for fall/winter. I normally wear a 40 in other barefoot shoes but I ordered up based on other reviews and 41 is perfect. Love the high top version as it’s hard to find a good high top sneaker that’s also barefoot. Only time will tell how durable they are but great first impressions.

The sizes posted are not correct. I ordered these twice now trying to get the correct size and both times it was wrong. I ordered a size 9 (41) and got a size 40. So keep that in mind if you choose to get these. Otherwise they looked great and probably would be comfy.

Fit: Wide toe bed I removed the insoles they came with and put in dr. Scholls for added comfort I removed the laces and put in no tie laces which make them slip on kind of I had to return the first pair as I measured my foot and it seemed like I would fit a 9 but they were too small. I ended up ordering at 9.5 /41 and they fit perfect , I would recommend to size up a half size
Comfy Love shoes
